name: 05-api
description: Ans-> MicroServices is an architectural approach for building applications. As an architectural framework microservices are `loosely coupled` which means it allows us to make seperate components which are independent for each other.So if one team changes some code inside the application it won't break the whole app. The benefit of using microservices is that development team are able to rapildy build new component of app to meet the business requirement.
